funny.quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not too sure.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: A balanced diet means a cupcake in each hand.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already.
funny.author: Tommy Cooper

funny.quote: I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She gave me a hug.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
funny.author: Jim Carrey

funny.quote: Why don’t skeletons fight each other? They don’t have the guts.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
funny.author: Charlie Chaplin

funny.quote: Some people graduate with honors, I am just honored to graduate.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: The only exercise I get is running out of money.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm just on energy-saving mode.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: If we shouldn’t eat at night, why is there a light in the fridge?
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: I finally figured out what I want to be when I get older… younger.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: I'm not great at advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?
funny.author: Chandler Bing

funny.quote: I dream of a better world where chickens can cross the road without their motives being questioned.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: Wine: Because no great story ever started with someone eating a salad.
funny.author: Unknown

funny.quote: You can't have everything. Where would you put it?
funny.author: Steven Wright

funny.quote: Life’s too short to be serious all the time. So, if you can’t laugh at yourself… call me, I’ll do it for you.
funny.author: Unknown
